mn50:2.4: garugaro viya → garu garu viya (bj, pts1 ṭīkāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ) | garugarutaro viya (s1-3)
mn50:4.7: jāneyya, kuto pana → kuto ca pana (s1-3)
mn50:9.5: vidhurassa vidhuroteva → vidhurassa vidhuro vidhurotveva (bj, s1-3, km) | vidhurassa vidhuro vidhuroteva (pts1)
mn50:11.6: sañjīvassa sañjīvoteva → sañjīvo sañjīvotveva (bj, s1-3, km) | sañjīvo sañjīvoteva (pts1)
